content: Ripples [v0.8.0 Public] [Jestur] Overview 游戏概述 Ripples is a sci-fi visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school. He reunites with his good friend Darci and sets off to school like any other day, but as the day goes on, he learns new information about his deceased father that has him questioning the truth about his death.​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.8Public 原版发布日：2025-07-13 汉化分享日：2025-06-28 Changelog 更新日志 2,216 New Images 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total) 6 New Gallery Scenes 50+ New Music Tracks 110+ New Sound Effects 5 New Hidden Renders Several Render Fixes Several Code Fixes Lots of Typos Fixed New UI (Thanks, Pax) New Main Menu New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added) Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene And Other Small Things Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Subscribestar Discord Twitter 落谦酱便利贴 关于汉化补丁 AI模型：DeepSeek-V3 翻译作者：落谦 温馨提醒：应该是没有漏翻的句子，有可能部分人名错翻了？（音译问题）最近DeepSeek-V3老是这样，有时候会，有时候不会，但是用其他引擎，跑出来的意译效果没V3的好，落谦实在没时间去逐句意译了，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（汉化补丁） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 安装步骤： 下载两个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压英文原版 将汉化补丁文件放置到game文件夹中 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 主体APK：下载APK 安装步骤： 下载三个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，放行所有权限 此时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，则自己手动毙掉 然后解压英文原版 将英文原版game文件夹中的rpa文件和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到： 1 Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.Ripples/game iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责
title: Ripples 涟漪

content: Astreon [Ch.2 v0.3.5] [NoGlory] Overview 游戏概述 In the year 2032, humanity stands on the brink of a technological breakthrough. A new material, developed by a group of scientists, possesses not only extraordinary strength, hyper-elasticity, and energy-saving properties, but also a unique, or rather exceptional, ability to self-repair. This capability turned the material into a regenerative pill, allowing people with limited abilities to become fully functional humans, while also making them stronger, smarter, and even extending their lifespan. Spoiler: More However, fearing the consequences of such power, the scientists decide to destroy the records, reports, and everything related to their research. They scattered, each going their own way. But as is often the case, someone found the remnants of this work. Ignoring the dangers, they decided to complete it, which eventually led to the formation of a globally banned terrorist organization called “Masquerade.” In response, leaders of major corporations launched a large-scale operation to eliminate the individual responsible and eradicate everything related to the research. You are a former soldier, unable to bear the guilt of the atrocities committed during the operation. You retreat to a remote location on the edge of the world, a small town cut off from the rest of civilization, where you planned to live a peaceful life with your wife and children, far removed from all the troubles of the past. But, as often happens, things do not go according to plan. One day, when your wife goes on a business trip to a certain research institute, she suddenly stops contacting you. In an attempt to find out what happened, you embark on a journey. Days, weeks, months, and years pass… Eventually, you come to terms with the fact that you may never see your wife again, burying all your emotions deep inside. Then, one day, your son arrives, asking for your help and with a glimmer of hope that not all is lost, that there is still a small chance to restore your peaceful life. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：Chapter 2 - 0.3.5 原版发布日：2025-10-31 Changelog 更新日志 2,216 New Images 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total) 6 New Gallery Scenes 50+ New Music Tracks 110+ New Sound Effects 5 New Hidden Renders Several Render Fixes Several Code Fixes Lots of Typos Fixed New UI (Thanks, Pax) New Main Menu New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added) Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene And Other Small Things Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Discord 落谦酱便利贴 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（官中） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压官中原版 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，选择简体中文即可 iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责

content:
Cross Realms [v0.3.0 Public] [DuskDuck] Overview 游戏概述 On the first day of your college life, you and a group of friends are sucked into a vortex. When you wake up, you realize you’re in a foreign place - this is not Earth. As you explore this new world, you discover it’s a Qi cultivation realm, where power determines everything. Spoiler There are nine Realms, each controlled by a dominant race: Humans, Demons, Deities, Spiritual Beasts, and more. Each Realm has a “spring” - a flow of Qi energy harvested from the Void, the space between Realms. Because of these springs, peace between the Realms is fragile and rarely lasts long. You arrive during the longest period of peace ever known, but how long will this so-called ‘peace’ really last?
As your journey continues, you uncover more secrets about these Realms. Someone in the shadows has been plotting and orchestrating your arrival. Will you be able to stand up for yourself in a world where many see you as nothing more than a useless ant?
The answer are yours to find.

title: Cross Realms 跨界

content:
Agent17 [v0.25.9] [HEXATAIL] Overview 游戏概述 You are an ordinary-looking pervert with average grades, blending into the background at school without anyone paying much attention to you. Occasionally, you may face bullying from troublemakers, possibly even being robbed or coerced into doing their bidding. However, one fateful day while heading home, you stumble upon a damaged phone. The phone initiated transformation in your life. Spoiler: More This phone has the power to solve all your problems. Contrary to popular belief, an unknown individual called Agent17 obeys the commands of whoever picks up the phone, allowing you to instruct her to carry out any task. Suddenly, your life takes a dramatic turn for the better. You triumph over the bullies who tormented you, and you exact revenge on the teachers and principals who held you in contempt.
The mundane school life that once held no interest for you begins to change as you start interacting with a multitude of talented and captivating individuals. As your connections deepen, you gradually uncover their hidden secrets. With the formidable abilities of Agent17 at your disposal, you also delve into their unknown mysteries. Moreover, you realize that your life is brimming with countless fascinating discoveries awaiting your exploration.

content: Apocalypse 2059 [v0.3] [BigH4nd.Inc] Overview 游戏概述 Apocalypse 2059 Welcome to the savage world of 2059, where survival is a daily struggle and civilization is nothing but a distant memory. The World That Was In 2030, an event known as “The Cataclysm” forever changed the face of Earth. Nuclear weapons claimed lives in an instant, plunging the world into a devastating nuclear winter that lasted over a decade. Civilization, law, and morality crumbled into dust. The surface became an inferno, forcing what little plant life remained to retreat underground. For the few who survived, existence became a constant battle against extinction. Twenty years have passed. The pre-war generation grows old, while a new generation rises, knowing nothing of the world that came before. Spoiler Your Story Begins The story takes place in the year 2059. You, the protagonist, have been living in solitude in a shelter since your birth. These peaceful days are changed by the appearance of a mysterious woman. At her urgent request, you’ll embark on a perilous journey across the savage lands of what was once civilization. Unforgettable Characters Your path will cross with unique survivors, each shaped by the merciless world they inhabit: A reckless and confident villain with her own agenda A young, sensitive tribal leader struggling to protect her people A ruthless warlord carving out her empire silver-tongued treasure hunter seeking fortune in the ruins 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.3 原版发布日：2025-10-09 Changelog 更新日志 What’s New in Version 0.3? Massive Content Update: Complete storyline of Chapter Two 500+ carefully designed new CGs 2000+ lines of new dialog and narrative content One hours of new main storyline gameplay (I didn’t actually count that part, I just felt it was about this much :p) New Characters: 1 important new female characters with unique backstories Deeper development of existing character relationships Technical Improvements & Enhancements: Character Tales CGs - I’m excited to introduce the first Character Tales CG featuring Harlie! While my original plan was to complete CGs for all characters in this update, I found myself struggling with thematic direction for the other characters’ Tales artwork. Rather than rush these important pieces, I’ve decided to take a more thoughtful approach. I’ll be opening discussions on our Discord server to gather community input on themes and ideas for the remaining Character Tales CGs. Your feedback will help shape these special artworks! Updated Russian localization - v0.25 Russian version now integrated into official release (Thanks to Debios) Continued Chinese language support - Full localization for all new content (Thanks to XerxesBreak) Performance optimizations and bug fixes Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Discord 落谦酱便利贴 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 DOWNLOAD（官中） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压官中原版 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，选择简体中文即可 iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责

content: FreshWomen [S2 Final Supporter Edition Steam] [OppaiMan] Overview 游戏概述 You’re a young man trying to find out what happened to your father. But in doing so, you ended up having an accident that erased some of your memories. Now, with a clean slate, you moved to another town to start college. In your freshman life, you will meet several girls in a new world filled with fun, mystery, and sex. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Daz Studio 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：欧美风 版本信息 当前版本：S2 Final Supporter Edition Steam 原版发布日：2025-10-23 汉化分享日：2025-10-26 Changelog 更新日志 6,324 gorgeous 4K renders; 407 animations in 60FPS; 68,577 words; Skins and pubes selection available in a few scenes in the Supporter Edition; Julia’s 3D printable statue, available in the Supporter Edition; Translations for: English, Spanish, French, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Japanese, Czech, Thai, Portuguese, Turkish and Russian; Voice acting, sexy sounds and moaning; Sweat, physics, and HD maps for all characters; Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Steam Discord 落谦酱便利贴 关于汉化补丁 AI模型：DeepSeek-V3 翻译作者：落谦 温馨提醒：应该是没有漏翻的句子，有可能部分人名错翻了？（音译问题）最近DeepSeek-V3老是这样，有时候会，有时候不会，但是用其他引擎，跑出来的意译效果没V3的好，落谦实在没时间去逐句意译了，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（官中） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中1 官中链接：下载官中2 安装步骤： 下载两个链接的文件，两个链接都可以下载，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压英文原版 将汉化补丁文件放置到game文件夹中 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 主体 APK：下载 APK 安装步骤： 下载两个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，放行所有权限 此时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，则自己手动毙掉 然后将AI意译汉化补丁rpa文件移动到： 1 Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.FreshWomen/game iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责
title: FreshWomen 新生也疯狂

content:
Mayfly [v0.2 Reset] [JasonTon] Overview 游戏概述 “The city’s sewers stink of blood and rust. Portraits of the wealthy and powerful line the streets, attempting to cover up the heinous crimes they’ve committed.”
“Is it truly brightness and warmth that meets you after suffering?” your life.
Spoiler The story is set in the city of Devon, the country’s only mega city. Plagued by a glaring wealth gap, Devon eventually divided into the Uppercity, where company execs and corpos live amidst opulence and luxury, and the Undercity, where factory workers and gangsters, including triads, dwell.
A decade ago, a phenomenon of unknown origin resulted in the sudden emergence of superpowers among individuals in and around the city, primarily among teenagers. However, this unexpected development presented a formidable challenge for the government, as these superpowered individuals started to engage in criminal activities. In particular, they targeted the Uppercity due to deep-rooted inequality, resorting to acts such as kidnapping and murder of the wealthy.
To tackle the rising crime rates, the government is compelled to implement two bills: the Vigilante Act and the Superpowers Act. The former empowers selected individuals with superpowers to go beyond traditional law enforcement measures to combat criminals, while the latter treats superpowered individuals differently from regular humans, eliminating age restrictions and establishing dedicated prisons for them.
Over time, superpowered crime in Devon steadily decreased thanks to the state-funded Vigilantes who are entrusted with the task of upholding justice. However, as the Vigilante force expanded, the balance started to shift as some Vigilantes with concealed motives became a new source of instability in the city. Additionally, after the initial surge of superpowers, no new superpowers have emerged in Devon. This results in a growing public demand for the abolition of the Vigilante Bill, and a change in public perception of Vigilantes from once-revered heroes to a more critical stance.
In such a setting, where you are a member of the Vigilantes, are you truly willing to let others dictate your fate? I believe the answer is unequivocally “Never.” Every decision you make, whether significant or seemingly inconsequential, has the potential to impact the relationships and alliances you form during your journey.
Is it to live fleetingly like a mayfly in this superficially vibrant city, or to leave a lasting legacy as a legend in the streets?
“The power to determine your destiny rests in your hands.”
游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.2 Reset 原版发布日：2025-01-22 Changelog 更新日志 1135+ New Renders 14 new animated CGs 3100+ entirely new lines of story text 6850+ entirely new lines of code 30+ new music tracks 100+ new sound effects New end credits scene The rendering quality has been significantly enhanced Added Volumetric Light/Volumetric Fog Higher-polygon models and new skeletal rigs have been added to the characters, allowing for more refined and detailed body movements The MC’s model and skin have been updated, making him look… more handsome, perhaps? Significant optimizations have been made to the transitions and sound effects in version 0.1, with a revision rate of over 70% A cheat document has been added… Open it, and it will guide you on which choices to make Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Discord Twitter 落谦酱便利贴 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（官中） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压官中原版 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 官中链接：下载官中 安装步骤： 下载官中链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，选择简体中文即可 iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责

content: Milfy Day [v0.8.9] [Red Lighthouse] Overview 游戏概述 Milfy Day is a visual novel game, you’ll play as a young man who has just moved into this small town. You’re staying with two hot mature women and their families. Because your family is going through a crisis, you need to revive your family, meet more local residents, help them and discover the secrets of the town. Of course the most important thing is that you have to successfully graduate and find a partner at the school prom.​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.8.9 原版发布日：2025-10-16 汉化分享日：2025-10-26 Changelog 更新日志 New Angelina content. New Zoey content. New Syndra content. A new girl. New dialogues. Text correction. Some renders fixes. New portraits. Bug fixes. content: New Family [v0.4.5] [King Peanut] Overview 游戏概述 The story begins with the main character, who lost their parents at a young age, being taken in by a new family. This new family, though not related by blood, is a small, close-knit community that relies on one another. As the main character lives and grows with them, they share in each other’s lives and experiences. The unfolding relationships within this family and the events they encounter together form the central storyline​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说 建模引擎：Koikatsu Sunshine 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：日系风 版本信息 当前版本：0.4.5 原版发布日：2025-10-16 汉化分享日：2025-10-17 Changelog 更新日志 This patch includes 2 new NSFW scenes for Noah and 5 new ones for Asami. You can now work out at the gym, and if your Strength is 5 or higher, you might find Asami there at night Asami’s been around since the early builds, but I kept delaying her update for a while. Honestly, her story might be a bit divisive - some people might love it, others might not Still, since the game’s heading toward its ending, I think it’s finally time to move forward with her part. content: New Horizon [v0.3] [KawaiiSukebe] Overview 游戏概述 What does a man have left after his father has gone missing, and his ex-girlfriend relentlessly broke up with him for seemingly no reason at all? An empty heart that lives through a monotonous everyday life. “Meeting you changed my world.” The fateful encounter got our story’s MC, Hirase Tatsuya, involved in something that could shake the whole country, or even the world. Come and unravel the secrets behind the MC’s missing father and all the unexpected bittersweet encounters with the girls.​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 2 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.3 原版发布日：2024-12-26 Changelog 更新日志 1300~ new renders 23 new animations New music and sfx New story content for Ayase, Miharu, Chika, Kaho. 1 scene with side character Maki. title: New Horizon 新天域

content: City Devil: Restart [V0.4] [Sabirow] Overview 游戏概述 In a new city, you start a fresh chapter of your life by enrolling in a high school. Embarking on this thrilling journey, you’ll encounter a diverse group of friends, including charming and beautiful girls. As you explore the town and its inhabitants, you will realize something mysterious and disturbing is happening here. Strange people and unexplained phenomena seem to haunt you. MC’s frequent nightmares add a creepy element to the story. As you interact with various characters, you will also have to make decisions that will affect the game’s outcome. Your choices will determine the course of the story and the relationships you form with other characters. 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.4 原版发布日：2025-10-15 汉化分享日：2025-10-17 Changelog 更新日志 2 600+ new images 305+ new animations 24 900+ new words 19 200+ rewritten words from earlier versions 90+ new music & ambient tracks 215+ new sound effects Updated relationship screen Numerous minor improvements & fixes Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Subscribestar Discord 落谦酱便利贴 关于汉化补丁 AI模型：DeepSeek-V3 翻译作者：落谦 温馨提醒：应该是没有漏翻的句子，有可能部分人名错翻了？（音译问题）最近DeepSeek-V3老是这样，有时候会，有时候不会，但是用其他引擎，跑出来的意译效果没V3的好，落谦实在没时间去逐句意译了，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 DOWNLOAD（汉化补丁） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 安装步骤： 下载两个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压英文原版 将汉化补丁文件放置到game文件夹中 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 主体 APK：下载 APK 安装步骤： 下载三个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，放行所有权限 此时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，则自己手动毙掉 然后解压英文原版 将英文原版game文件夹中的rpa文件和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到： 1 Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.CityDevilRestart/game iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责

content: Ripples [v0.8.0 Public] [Jestur] Overview 游戏概述 Ripples is a sci-fi visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school. He reunites with his good friend Darci and sets off to school like any other day, but as the day goes on, he learns new information about his deceased father that has him questioning the truth about his death.​ 游戏信息 游戏类型 游戏玩法：视觉小说 建模引擎：Honey Select 运行引擎：Ren’Py 游戏画风：亚洲风 版本信息 当前版本：0.8Public 原版发布日：2025-07-13 汉化分享日：2025-06-28 Changelog 更新日志 2,216 New Images 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total) 6 New Gallery Scenes 50+ New Music Tracks 110+ New Sound Effects 5 New Hidden Renders Several Render Fixes Several Code Fixes Lots of Typos Fixed New UI (Thanks, Pax) New Main Menu New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added) Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene And Other Small Things Developer（入正地址） Patreon Itch.io Subscribestar Discord Twitter 落谦酱便利贴 关于汉化补丁 AI模型：DeepSeek-V3 翻译作者：落谦 温馨提醒：应该是没有漏翻的句子，有可能部分人名错翻了？（音译问题）最近DeepSeek-V3老是这样，有时候会，有时候不会，但是用其他引擎，跑出来的意译效果没V3的好，落谦实在没时间去逐句意译了，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。 落谦酱点评 评分项 评分 点评 建模 ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 渲染 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 SFW剧情（素戏） ⭐⭐⭐☆☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 NSFW剧情（荤戏） ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 BGM ⭐⭐⭐⭐☆ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 时长 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 CG ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 待，目前落谦没时间点评，哈哈。 游戏预览图 素图 荤图 DOWNLOAD（汉化补丁） Win/Linux（PC端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 安装步骤： 下载两个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 解压英文原版 将汉化补丁文件放置到game文件夹中 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可 Android（安卓端） 下载文件： 英文原版链接：下载原版 AI意译汉化补丁：下载补丁 主体APK：下载APK 安装步骤： 下载三个链接的文件，如果打不开链接，则需要科学上网，没有梯子可以参考此处——魔戒 安装APK文件 启动游戏，放行所有权限 此时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，则自己手动毙掉 然后解压英文原版 将英文原版game文件夹中的rpa文件和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到： 1 Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.Ripples/game iOS（苹果端） 根据PC端的步骤操作即可，再使用 Spark 等模拟器进行游玩 Spark模拟器AppStore有售 宇宙安全声明！ 本文章仅供学习与交流，请勿商用或非法传播 落谦不对因使用本文所产生的任何问题负责
